Articles.Content:
I am looking/requesting for a mod that provides an extending docking port. One that would be great for use in shuttle cargo-bays. It does not have to extend very far, maybe a meter or two. Ideally I would like one in 1.25 and 2.5 sized docking ports. 

I know LLL has one, but its ..square and for LLL parts mostly and last I checked it wasn't updated yet for 1.0.2. OPT has one that has the OPT form factor can not be used for Stock designs.

If anyone else knows of a mod that has this, please point me to it. 

Thank you in advance for anyone who can provide this for me.
you can do this with Infernal Robotics, but IR has a lot of other stuff that you probably don't want.
